about_the_game:
~ even the sun needs a little rest to rise and be bright ~

Sleepy Time Jack is a Digital Talking Body Pillow, or a Sleep ASMR App, based on Something's Wrong With Sunny Day Jack, featuring the titular main character known as Jack. This game can be enjoyed with or without prior knowledge of the source material.



Fall asleep to the soothing sound of your best friend's voice as he praises and comforts you!

Current Features:
  • Message Interval function to adjust how often Jack speaks
  • Sleep Timer function that will automatically turn the app off after a set amount of time passes without interaction
  • Additional Accessibility Options for Font, Text Size, Textbox Opacity, Music and Voice Volume
  • Fully Voiced Dialogue in English
  • Access to Clothed Dialogue
  • Holiday and Birthday Greetings

Planned Features:
  • 4 Text Languages: English, Latin Español, 日本語, русский
  • 4 Audio Languages: English, Latin Español, 日本語, русский
  • Choose Any Text & Audio Language Configuration

content_descriptors.notes: This is a side app whose content is based on an Adult psychological horror visual novel featuring graphic sex between adults aged over 25 years. As such, we would like to restrict purchases of this game to those over the age of 18.
